text: Justin Paul (born January 3, 1985) is an American composer and lyricist. He is best known for writing songs for movies such as La La Land (2016) and The Greatest Showman (2017), and the stage musical Dear Evan Hansen. He is also known for writing songs with his songwriting partner, Benj Pasek. With Pasek, Paul became the 20th/21st person to win the EGOT, which is when a person won the Emmy, Grammy, Oscar, and Tony Awards. ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Best Original Song Academy Award-winning songwriters Category:Drama Desk Award winners Category:Emmy Award winners Category:Golden Globe Award winning writers Category:Tony Award winners Category:Satellite Award winners Category:American singer-songwriters Category:American composers Category:Singers from St. Louis, Missouri Category:Writers from St. Louis, Missouri
